entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (mtp_trapped_meatlump_giver.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_11: Hey, hey! One of the Meatlumps never made it out of the lower maintenance areas. I think he's trapped down there. Can you find him for me?
entries.s_15: Oh good. You'll have to be fast, though. He's probably raised an alarm by now. I wouldn't risk more than about ten or so minutes down there.
entries.s_19: Couldn't rescue him in time, eh? I knew security would be close on your heels.
entries.s_20: Yeah, we probably shouldn't risk anyone else getting lost down there.
entries.s_4: You rescued him! What a relief. Thank you!!
entries.s_7: Go find that lost Meatlump. He's somewhere in the lower maintenance areas.
entries.s_9: No one else has gotten trapped lately, but it seems to happen a lot. Check back later in case I need your help again.
